items.content_html: This web app is built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript to create an elegant digital wedding invitation. It lets guests RSVP directly from the card and is fully customizable to match your wedding theme, all while keeping the performance lightweight without extra libraries.
items.title: fahmizainal17/Digital_Wedding_Invitation_Project: This web app is built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript to create an elegant digital wedding invitation. It lets guests RSVP directly from the card and is fully customizable to match your wedding theme, all while keeping the performance lightweight without extra libraries.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible minifier for JavaScript, CSS, and HTML with live file-watching support.
items.title: ramoures/minifix: A lightweight and flexible minifier for JavaScript, CSS, and HTML with live file-watching support.

items.title: miniapp-tool/mptool: A lightweight miniprogram framework

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: A tool that lets you schedule lightweight background tasks to run after the HTTP response is sent, **with** optional toast notifications in the frontend. This is perfect for offloading small or moderate tasks (e.g., updates, sending logs, quick DB modifications) without the overhead of Celery.
items.title: AyubKa4a/django-offload-with-logs: A tool that lets you schedule lightweight background tasks to run after the HTTP response is sent, **with** optional toast notifications in the frontend. This is perfect for offloading small or moderate tasks (e.g., updates, sending logs, quick DB modifications) without the overhead of Celery.

items.content_html: A lightweight and flexible task scheduling library for JavaScript & TypeScript. Easily manage interval-based and one-time tasks with precise execution control.
items.title: erfanezk/schedi: A lightweight and flexible task scheduling library for JavaScript & TypeScript. Easily manage interval-based and one-time tasks with precise execution control.

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: wysimark ( https://github.com/portive/wysimark ) is a modern and clean rich text editor for React, supporting CommonMark and GFM Markdown spec. It is a fork of wysimark with some modifications to make it more lightweight and easier to use.
items.title: takeshy/wysimark-lite: wysimark ( https://github.com/portive/wysimark ) is a modern and clean rich text editor for React, supporting CommonMark and GFM Markdown spec. It is a fork of wysimark with some modifications to make it more lightweight and easier to use.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.
items.title: its-ryyt/Philippines---Javascript-Address-Selector: A lightweight and efficient JavaScript address selector for the Philippines, designed to streamline the process of selecting regions, provinces, cities, and barangays in web applications.

items.content_html: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently. A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.
items.title: nigrosimone/turbo-array: Turbo Array is a lightweight, high-performance library that allows you to build lazy evaluation pipelines for arrays. It supports operations like filter, map, reduce, forEach, and join, executing them efficiently.  A method build with Turbo Array is 4x faster than vanilla version.

items.content_html: Fanos is a lightweight JavaScript promise-based library that simplifies sending asynchronous requests using the Beacon API.
items.title: nassiry/fanosjs: Fanos is a lightweight JavaScript promise-based library that simplifies sending asynchronous requests using the Beacon API.
